metadata.description: A marvel of modern engineering, where intricate clockwork mechanisms govern the rhythms of time itself. The structure is home to a mysterious order of clockworkers who tend the gears with devotion.
metadata.atmosphere: Labyrinthine mysticism: towering clock faces loom overhead, their hands ticking away as mysterious chanting echoes through the corridors.
metadata.significance: A location where players may gain insight into the workings of time and possibly manipulate its flow for their own purposes.
